items.summary: In the mobile search UI, set the search form to use `margin-block-end: auto` so the form aligns correctly on mobile.
On the Home page, remove padding from the wrapper div currently using `className="py-4 px-4 lg:px-0 lg:py-0"` so it no longer applies padding.

On the Tags page (Tag Hub), remove the `mb-4` margin-bottom from the tabs header divider container (the div described as `class="border-b border-border bg-background mb-4"`) so there is no bottom margin applied by that element.

On the Tag page, remove the `mb-4` margin-bottom from the Tabs root container described as `class="flex flex-col gap-2 mb-4"` (e.g., by overriding the Tabs root class/style in `TagPage.tsx` without editing shadcn/ui source files).

On the Pond page, remove the always-rendered mobile-only padding wrapper `div` with `className="py-4 px-4 lg:hidden"` that creates empty vertical space; if that wrapper is currently used for the Join button area, refactor so the wrapper only renders when the Join button section is actually shown (i.e., when the user is not a member).
